00001 /*  DEVIL - Descent Editor for Vertices, Items and Levels at all
00002     Copyright (C) 1995  Achim Stremplat (ubdb@rz.uni-karlsruhe.de)
00003     Further info see .c-files.
00004     These are the structure needed for texturemapping. This file
00005     is included by plotsys.c, plottxt.c, plot.c and grfx.c */
00006 /* #define PLOTTOSCREEN */
00007 #define MAX_RENDERDEPTH 30
00008 #define MAX_RENDERPNTS 30
00009 #define TXTSIZE 64
00010 
00011 struct point_2d {
00012     float x[2];
00013 };
00014 struct point_txt {
00015     int x[2];
00016 };
00017 struct render_point
00018 {
00019     struct render_point *prev, *next;
00020     float x[2];
00021     long light;
00022 };
00023 struct polygon_point
00024 {
00025     struct polygon_point *prev, *next; /* prev/next pp. This is a
00026                                         counter-clockwise sorted ring of pnts */
00027     struct point *p_3d; /* point in normal space */
00028     struct corner *corner;
00029 };
00030 struct polygon
00031 {
00032     int num_pnts;
00033     struct polygon_point pnts[4];
00034     struct point a_3d, r_3d, s_3d, n_3d; /* polygon plane */
00035     struct point_2d a_txt, r_txt, s_txt; /* texture plane */
00036 };
00037 
00038 extern struct point e0, er[3]; /* e0 and e[3] for current view */
00039 extern float xviewphi, yviewphi, z_dist; /* this is the cos(view angle) */
00040 extern struct point x0; /* x0 viewpoint, m0 line viewpoint-center of screen */
00041 extern int max_xcoord, max_ycoord; /* (scr_xysize-1)/2 */
00042 extern int scr_xsize, scr_ysize; /* always a uneven number */
